blog.title: The sky may be falling, but the stars look good on you
blog.description:
D&D, Critical Role, Discworld. 
-
I create meta, gifsets, fanart and fanfiction.

My inbox is always open for prompts, and I love getting them... but no guarantees.

summary: janamensch replied to your post: I've been thinking about Nott a lot lately. With... Nott was one of the characters I liked less...
body:
janamensch replied to your post: I’ve been thinking about Nott a lot lately. With…

Nott was one of the characters I liked less than some others before, but now that you have pointed all of this out in one post… I should have noticed all of that sooner, she is amazing! :o

Well, that’s the best possible thing I could have hoped to achieve by writing that post! Thank you!

blog.description: Hi! I’m TuiteyFruity (b. 1995). Call me Tuitey for short. Pronounce it like the jellybean flavor Tutti Frutti! I am known for writing the Let it Go parody "Let Them Burn". This blog is safe for work! [They/Them]. Jewish (duh). Religious but not spiritual. Homeschmuck.

summary: how smart do you think grog is by now? by that i mean, he’s had 20-ish years of reading, learning to read, learning his letters...
body:
how smart do you think grog is by now?

by that i mean, he’s had 20-ish years of reading, learning to read, learning his letters and writing, hell the last we heard of him he went and got himself a tutor and seemed to really want to double down on working out the brain muscle.

even if he’s sort of on and off about it or not super consistent, that’s still two decades of working to make his mind stronger. i’m curious what a grog in current day exandria is like.

tags: When Lucian cast Healing Word in the Song of the Lorelei Sam's eyes lit up
summary: My favourite tiny carryover effect from Campaign 1 is the fact that Sam gets this slight smile whenever someone casts Healing...
body: My favourite tiny carryover effect from Campaign 1 is the fact that Sam gets this slight smile whenever someone casts Healing Word, and of course that one time Jester said her Healing Word was ‘dogshit’ and Sam got incredibly offended.

reblog.comment: My favourite tiny carryover effect from Campaign 1 is the fact that Sam gets this slight smile whenever someone casts Healing Word, and of course that one time Jester said her Healing Word was ‘dogshit’ and Sam got incredibly offended.

summary: I have no time to write a longfic based on this drabble I wrote for the incredible @hla-rosa but god its the only thing I’ve...
body:
I have no time to write a longfic based on this drabble I wrote for the incredible @hla-rosa but god its the only thing I’ve been able to think about lately so here we go:

  • Nott, Jester, and Beau (Brave & Lavore & their security guard) are called on by a woman called Yasha to help solve a case
  • The staff of the Fletching & Moondrop Jazz Club have stumbled across a random, mute, amnesiac tiefling in the woods, and while they don’t mind taking him in, they want to know who he is
  • So the detective gang meets him, but they find no leads
  • Except for the strange tattoos on his body
  • So, Nott hits up one of her contacts, a scruffy wizard with a mysterious past who does under-the-table enchantments and spellwork for the criminal elements of the city
  • And who also happens to be her sort-of-son (its complicated)
  • Meanwhile, Jester seeks out Fjord, a friendly (and very handsome) half-orc who works at a popular speakeasy and has his ear to the ground, to flirt ask him if he’s heard anything about missing folks or strange tattooed people
  • And meanwhile meanwhile, Beau is hanging around the Moondrop, trying and failing to hook up with Yasha
  • A few days go by while they research, various domestic shenanigans and time-killing conversation scenes, Fjord and Caleb end up getting way more invested than they thought they would
  • In that downtime, Mystery Tiefling™ seems to be settling in, and is becoming more responsive to the bar people and detectives
  • The gang spend a lot of time together, helping Caleb pour through books at a booth in the bar and making MT sit with them as they work
  • Eventually they find hints at something called “Bloodhunters,” but there’s hardly any information and Caleb is annoyed, saying he doesn’t have as many resources as he’d like
  • Beau grudgingly reveals she could get him into the Archive, and they all leap on that
  • As those two leave, the rest decide to bring MT out of the bar to show him around the city
  • He seems to awaken, still doesn’t speak but is entranced and even smiles at all the colorful decorations being put up on all the buildings
  • Which are for the Harvest Close festival which is coming soon, hey, Jester suggests that maybe they should all go together and take MT too!
  • And right as they’re leaving the town square, out of the corner of her eye, Nott catches some hooded figures staring at them intently
  • They start heading back to the Moondrop, they realize they’re being followed, they start to move faster, then they run, and a Wild Chase ensues™
  • At one point, as the gang fires magic back to try and throw their pursuers off, one figure thrusts out their palm and blood pours out and for a hot second, MT is paralyzed
  • But he seems to know what to do about this, blood comes out of one of his neck tattoos and he breaks free and after some more crossfire they duck into an alley and hide 
  • The hooded figures rush by, shouting and asking where they went, saying something about “Did you see that? It was him! It was Lucien, after all!”
  • The gang waits a few more minutes, and when the coast is clear, they rush home and get there safely
  • They’re all rattled, and bewildered, and MT most of all seems beyond confused and distressed and when they ask him who Lucien is, he just shakes his head and doesn’t speak
  • An hour later, Caleb and Beau return with a bunch of documents and information about a wild kind of magic that’s old and largely forbidden, where people can harness their own blood to do strange things
  • “Yeah, been there, learned that,” says Fjord.
  • “But what does this mean?” asks Jester.
  • And then, they all realize that MT, dubbed “Mollymauk Tealeaf,” not only is a weird unidentified tiefling from the woods, but is also a weird unidentified tiefling with strange, dark ties to a dangerous cult of blood magic users who seem to know all about his past, and where he is now, and who really, really want him back.
  • “Well shit,” says Nott. “I think this means that our mystery…just got a whole lot trickier.”
body_abstract:
I have no time to write a longfic based on this drabble I wrote for the incredible @hla-rosa but god its the only thing I’ve been able to think about lately so here we go:

  • Nott, Jester, and Beau (Brave & Lavore & their security guard) are called on by a woman called Yasha to help solve a case
  • The staff of the Fletching & Moondrop Jazz Club have stumbled across a random, mute, amnesiac tiefling in the woods, and while they don’t mind taking him in, they want to know who he is
  • So the detective gang meets him, but they find no leads
  • Except for the strange tattoos on his body

  • “But what does this mean?” asks Jester.
  • And then, they all realize that MT, dubbed “Mollymauk Tealeaf,” not only is a weird unidentified tiefling from the woods, but is also a weird unidentified tiefling with strange, dark ties to a dangerous cult of blood magic users who seem to know all about his past, and where he is now, and who really, really want him back.
  • “Well shit,” says Nott. “I think this means that our mystery…just got a whole lot trickier.”

  • At one point, as the gang fires magic back to try and throw their pursuers off, one figure thrusts out their palm and blood pours out and for a hot second, MT is paralyzed
  • But he seems to know what to do about this, blood comes out of one of his neck tattoos and he breaks free and after some more crossfire they duck into an alley and hide 
  • The hooded figures rush by, shouting and asking where they went, saying something about “Did you see that? It was him! It was Lucien, after all!”
  • The gang waits a few more minutes, and when the coast is clear, they rush home and get there safely
  • They’re all rattled, and bewildered, and MT most of all seems beyond confused and distressed and when they ask him who Lucien is, he just shakes his head and doesn’t speak
  • An hour later, Caleb and Beau return with a bunch of documents and information about a wild kind of magic that’s old and largely forbidden, where people can harness their own blood to do strange things
  • “Yeah, been there, learned that,” says Fjord.
  • “But what does this mean?” asks Jester.
  • And then, they all realize that MT, dubbed “Mollymauk Tealeaf,” not only is a weird unidentified tiefling from the woods, but is also a weird unidentified tiefling with strange, dark ties to a dangerous cult of blood magic users who seem to know all about his past, and where he is now, and who really, really want him back.
  • “Well shit,” says Nott. “I think this means that our mystery…just got a whole lot trickier.”
trail.content_abstract:
I have no time to write a longfic based on this drabble I wrote for the incredible @hla-rosa but god its the only thing I’ve been able to think about lately so here we go:

  • Nott, Jester, and Beau (Brave & Lavore & their security guard) are called on by a woman called Yasha to help solve a case
  • The staff of the Fletching & Moondrop Jazz Club have stumbled across a random, mute, amnesiac tiefling in the woods, and while they don’t mind taking him in, they want to know who he is
  • So the detective gang meets him, but they find no leads
  • Except for the strange tattoos on his body

blog.name: bettydice
blog.title: Cosmic Dancer
blog.description: Writer (mostly Dragon Age/Mass Effect), Musician (taking commissions!), Connoisseur of Dramatic K-Drama Storylines, D&D

tags: let me try a repost because the other post didn't really take off!
summary: Music Commissions
title: Music Commissions
body:
Hey everyone!

My commissions are pretty much always open now, but I’m going to offer
5 SPOTS for a special “I just moved and everything is set up and I’m so ready to get back in the game” offer! :D

I’m offering personalised music at 50$ for up to three minutes! (min. 2 min 30, then I’ll just let it come to an end naturally)

*The offer is for digital only music, not my piano pieces

What exactly do I mean when I say “personalised music”?
I’ve done a lot of background music and character themes for D&D Games, check them out on my bandcamp!

If you go through my piano/music tag here on tumblr you’ll also see that I’ve composed a lot of music for other people’s stories and fanfics. Which has honestly always been a joy to do! :)

If you’re interested in one of the spots, e-mail me at nightrednotes@gmail.com!

(Payment can be done via Paypal but I also have an international bank account, so Paypal is not required.)

blog.name: captain-narava-felidae-riggs
blog.title: The tide has washed the nice from me
blog.description: WOW/SWTOR. Captain Narava of both worlds. Goblin. My hobbies include: Crying while watching hockey, crying while watching Critical Role, and crying while watching Glee clips on YouTube. Also knitting. Over 40 and cool with it. Perniciously Aneimic, hella anxious, depressed widow, biromantic demisexual . Slytherin. OTP: Narava/Corso, Alt OTP: Avarane/Corso, Completely different fandom otp: Perc'ahlia. Pens/Stanley Cup. She/her. Unless you’re Taliesin Jaffe, I’m not interested.
